channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A mysterious Chinese company just teased its first cheap Micro Four Thirds camera – but don’t expect it to be an OM System killer
item.description: OM System has announced the entry of Chinese budget camera manufacturer Sonida into the Micro Four Thirds System, but the expected new Songdian-branded camera probably won't take on offerings from OM System or Lumix

item.title: Swiss scientists want to make long AI-generated videos even better by preventing them from 'degrading into randomness' - is that a good idea? I am not so sure
item.description: EPFL researchers teach AI to correct its own mistakes in video sequences, reducing drift and potentially extending realistic duration.

item.title: Dell's Presidents' Day sale is a goldmine for business professionals - these are the desktop and laptop deals worth checking out
item.description: Some great Windows 11 laptops and desktops get a big price-cut over at Dell.

item.title: Sex toys maker Tenga says hacker stole customer information
item.description: The Japanese sex toy maker said a hacker broke into an employee's inbox and stole customer names, email addresses, and correspondence, including order details and customer service inquiries.

item.title: ULA’s Vulcan Rocket Suffers Familiar Anomaly During Launch of US Military Satellites
item.description: Shortly after liftoff, an unusual plume shot out of one of the solid rocket boosters.

item.title: Social Security Workers Are Being Told to Hand Over Appointment Details to ICE
item.description: The recent request goes against decades of precedent and puts noncitizens at further risk of immigration enforcement actions.

item.title: Les grandes galaxies elliptiques contredisent-elle vraiment l'âge de l'Univers ?
item.description: Hubble, puis ensuite le James-Webb ont débusqué des grandes galaxies elliptiques tôt dans l'histoire du Cosmos, laissant certains avancer que l'Univers observable devait être plus âgé qu'on ne le pensait pour avoir eu le temps de faire naître ces galaxies. Mais est-ce bien le cas, surtout suite...

item.title: OpenAI Users Launch Movement to Save Most Sycophantic Version of ChatGPT
item.description: Right before Valentine's Day, too.

item.title: Two years of the NordVPN Complete plan is 70 percent off
item.description:
NordVPN is having a big sale on its two-year plans right now. The Complete tier, for example is 70 percent off, bringing the price of 24 months down to just $130. NordVPN regularly appears on Engadget’s list of the best VPN services thanks to its wide server network, strong security tools and consistent performance across devices. NordVPN’s latest promotion puts one of its most comprehensive plans at a price that undercuts many competing premium VPN subscriptions.
The Complete tier includes full access to NordVPN’s core VPN service, which encrypts internet traffic and masks a user’s IP addre...

item.title: 'We have to up our game' — Jon Favreau on taking The Mandalorian to the big screen
item.description: Jon Favreau explains why The Mandalorian & Grogu had to “up our game” for theaters — and teases what’s next for Grogu.

item.title: The see-through Beats Studio Buds Plus are more than 40 percent off for Presidents Day
item.description: If you like how well AirPods work with iPhones but want something more colorful and flexible, the Beats Studio Buds Plus are a nice middle ground. They’re platform-agnostic and are on sale for $99.95 ($70 off) at Amazon, Best Buy, Target, and Walmart for Presidents Day. The deal includes the eye-catching translucent option and is […]

item.title: Hasbro Celebrates ‘Transformers: The Movie’ by Apologizing for It
item.description: If you're still upset over 'Transformers: The Movie' whacking Optimus Prime, you've got a whole year to accept Hasbro's 'we're sorry.'

item.title: Who needs Netflix and Prime Video? These 4K Blu-ray starter packs can unlock the ultimate movie-watching experience
item.description: 4K Blu-ray provides the sort of quality streaming could never live up to – and these starter packs are all you need to experience the joy of UHD discs.

item.title: Binance France President Targeted in Latest Crypto Home Invasion
item.description: The wrench attacks will continue until moral improves.

item.title: Valve's latest Steam beta lets you add your PC's specs to game reviews
item.description: An upcoming update to Steam includes a helpful improvement to game reviews. As part of the Steam Client Beta update Valve released on February 12, users will now be able to attach information about their hardware specifications when they post a new game review or update an old one.It's not uncommon to find negative reviews that complain about a game's performance, information that's hard to draw a conclusion from without knowing what kind of hardware the reviewer is using. With specs attached, the usefulness of complaints becomes a little bit easier to gauge. A game's sales performance and dis...

item.title: How to watch NBA All-Star 2026: Live stream every game, TV channels
item.description: Basketball’s biggest names are ready for an all-out showdown. Here's how to watch NBA All-Star 2026 live streams in all parts of the world.

item.title: US Weather Pulls a Switcheroo
item.description: Finally, some snow for the West and warmer temperatures for the East.

item.title: Senators Urge Top Regulator to Stay Out of Prediction Market Lawsuits
item.description: As prediction market platforms like Polymarket and Kalshi battle regulators in court, Senate Democrats are urging the CFTC to avoid weighing in, escalating a broader fight over the burgeoning industry.

item.title: Join Our Livestream: The Hype, Reality, and Future of EVs
item.description: Pose your questions to a panel of WIRED experts about the future of the electric vehicle industry.

item.title: 27 charming lilac home office finds for your dreamy desk set-up
item.description: Create your perfect playful workspace.

item.title: ‘Good Luck, Have Fun, Don’t Die’ Is Way Over the Top and We Love That About It
item.description: Sam Rockwell stars in the manic, poignant sci-fi love letter from director Gore Verbinski.

item.title: Wendy’s is closing hundreds of U.S. restaurants as domestic sales slide
item.description: The fast food burger chain is planning to shut down around 300 stores in 2026, as sales in the U.S. slump. Wendy’s is moving ahead with its plans to close hundreds of restaurants, amounting to between 5 and 6% of its total stores in the U.S., according to its fourth quarter earnings report.

item.title: Have an old Mac, iPhone, or iPad gathering dust? Get down to Best Buy right now to trade it in for generous savings on new Apple products
item.description: If you have an old Apple device lying around, Best Buy is currently offering a trade-in offer that allows you to save big on a brand-new Apple device.

item.title: ChatGPT caricature trend: What to do if OpenAI clearly knows too much
item.description: The ChatGPT caricature trend has gone mega-viral, but it actually reveals a lot about our relationship with AI and privacy.

item.title: Spotify said AI has been doing the heavy lifting for its coding since December
item.description: Spotify says its developers are using AI for coding now.
